greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Transposed version of A080955: T(n,k) = A080955(k,n), n>=0, k>=-1.
comment: Can be extended to columns with negative indices k<0 via T(n,k) = A292977(n,-k). - _Max Alekseyev_, Mar 06 2018
formula: For n>0, k>=-1, T(n,k) is the permanent of the n X n matrix with k+1 on the diagonal and 1 elsewhere.
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Dec 12 2003
ext: Edited and changed offset for k to -1 by _Max Alekseyev_, Mar 08 2018
